name: PAYIR TRUST

address: Payir Trust Thenur Village (via) T. Kalathur Kunnam

briefDescription: Work covers 7 villages towards holistic development & District level facilitation for strengthening children health and education, differently abled.8 Community health workers reach out to 15,000 villagers in 6 villages.Supplementary Nutrition program for malnourished kids at district levelWorking with 23 Government Primary, Middle and High schools covering 3000 children.Video-conference based e-Learning and Tele-Medicine.Boot-strapped 10 livelihood income generation business among villages.Nurturing Sacred groove of traditional tree varieties in 15 acres.Abolished Illicit liquor.
